attributes.action: Britain must accept its fair share of refugees seeking safety in Europe
attributes.background: The latest pictures of a dead child washed up on the shores of Bodrum must serve as a wake-up call to David Cameron. No longer can we turn a blind eye to the plight of needy people fleeing war-torn countries. It's time for Britain to accept a quota of refugees alongside other EU countries.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105991

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.

In any case, we can only accept petitions from named individuals, not with names of organisations.
